A mụrụ Grace Tubwita na Nakasongola District ma ọ na-asụ asụsụ obodo

Ọ nọchitere anya distrikti ahụ na ndị omeiwu Uganda ugboro abụọ n'usoro; n'oge ndị omeiwu nke asaa (2001 ruo 2006) na ndị omebe iwu nke asatọ (2006 ruo 2011), na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement (NRM)
A tụfuru oche ya n'oge ntuli aka nke NRM nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri
Ọ meriri Margaret Komuhangi, onye nọ n'ọkwa, onye ọ meriri ugboro abụọ, na 2003 na 2015.

Tubwita na-anọdụ na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Uganda National Oil Company, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ mba. Ọ bụkwa onye otu National Forestry Authority (NFA), ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ gọọmentị nwere, dịka Minista nke Ozi na National Guidance, Rose Namayanja, mara ọkwa na 17 Julaị 2014. Na Septemba 2016, e nyere Tubwita Grace Bagaya Bukenya "Medaal of Honor nke ndị omeiwu" iji kwado ọrụ ndị omeiwu ya na Uganda.
